title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama models for in-editor code completion.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example showing how to combine Ollama embeddings and Llama-3 for local question answering.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks, GPU tweaks, and advanced prompting tricks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama; nimble install ollama.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to talk to Ollama; useful for desktop/mobile chat apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-based LLM chats.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault and auto-insert completions.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds /ollama block slash for inline AI assistance using local models.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot using python-telegram-bot and ollama-python for private local chats.
